snippet: When a prudent candidate like Mitt Romney picks someone like Paul Ryan as his running mate, it suggests that he felt he held a losing position.
abstract: When a prudent candidate like Mitt Romney picks someone like Paul Ryan as his running mate, it suggests that he felt he held a losing position.

headline.main: A Risky Rationale Behind Romney's Choice of Ryan
headline.print_headline: The Rationale Behind an Audacious Move
